info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:24AM MDT until April 18 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations mostly between 2 and 4 inches, but up to 6 inches on the highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although some melting of snow on impact with roads is expected, reduced visibility and locally slick roads will result in difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
